akn:section.akn:heading: Tax on transfer of taxable estate of residents; amounts; credit; property of resident defined.

akn:content.akn:p: A tax in the amount of the federal credit is imposed on the transfer of the taxable estate having its taxable situs in the District of every resident decedent dying after March 31, 1987, but before January 1, 2016, subject, where applicable, to the credit provided for in subsection (b) of this section.
